title: Live in style at IMT Pleasanton! Newly renovated 2 bed / 2 bath!
posting_body: ['IMT Pleasanton - A place to call home!', 'Bed: 2 / Bath: 2', 'Sq.', 'Footage: 933 sq ft', 'Rent: $2975/Month', 'Terms: 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', '**Walk-ins welcome & choose from 3 tour options.', '**', 'IMT Pleasanton apartments in Pleasanton, CA offers 1 & 2 bedroom apartment homes for rent just minutes from I-580, I-680, and the Stoneridge Mall.', 'Take a Virtual Tour of Our Property Today!', '<URL>', 'Our Apartment Homes Feature:', '➢ Breakfast Bar', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Fireplace in Select Homes', '➢ Fully Equipped Kitchen', '➢ Gourmet Kitchens with Energy-efficient Appliances', '➢ In-Home Washer/Dryer', '➢ Luxurious Baths w/Walk-in Showers & Large Vanity Mirrors', '➢ Upgraded Cabinetry and Brand New Flooring', '➢ Vaulted Ceilings and Fans in Select Homes', '➢ Wood-Style Flooring in Kitchen & Living Areas', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '➢ Expansive Sundeck', '➢ Freeway Access', '➢ IMT Active', '➢ IMT CoWork', '➢ Luxury Amenities', '➢ On-Site Maintenance', '➢ On-Site Management', '➢ On-Site Patrol', '➢ Pet Friendly', '➢ 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '➢ Accepts Electronic Payments', '➢ Beautiful 1 and 2 Bedroom Apartments', '➢ Close Proximity to Shopping, Dining & School', '➢ Covered Parking Available', '➢ Minutes from I-580 and I-680', '➢ Pond with Fountain Feature', '➢ Professionally Landscaped', '➢ Public Transportation', '➢ Resort-Style Pool & Spa', 'Contact Info:', 'show contact info', '3992 Stoneridge Drive', 'Pleasanton, CA 94588', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Mon - Sat: 9:30 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Pets:', 'Pets allowed!', 'Two pet maximum.', '$500 pet deposit for up to two pets.', 'Pet rent is $50 per month per pet.', 'No weight restriction.', 'Some breed restrictions apply.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '6373DFB06EA24F9']
